message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the product at a price of $11,500. I believe this offer represents excellent value given the benefits it will provide.
Alice, thanks for the offer. However, that price seems a bit high to me. Would you be willing to come down to $10,000?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $10,000 is below the value I place on this product. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $10,750?
I understand that your product is valuable, Alice. How about we settle at $10,500? That's a fair compromise.
